Description.Text: Club St George Resort is a 5-star property offering contemporary accommodation north of Paphos. Highlights include ten outdoor swimming pools, a health club and an international restaurant. Tremithousa is a traditional village in the west of Cyprus. It boasts a good selection of restaurants and tavernas and direct road links to several sandy beaches. Regional places of interest include Paphos Castle, Aphroditeâs Rock, the Tombs of the Kings and Paphos Archaeological Park. Kato Paphos bus station provides fast and easy access to other popular Cyprus destinations. The resort is housed in a collection of traditional Cypriot low-rise buildings. Facilities include 10 outdoor swimming pools and a health club with an indoor swimming pool, gym, aerobics room, sauna and a Jacuzzi. A range of massages and spa treatments are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. 1-Bedroom Apartments are minimalistic and decorated in a contemporary style. They comprise a spacious bedroom, separate living room with a sofa, coffee table and dining table and chairs and a well-equipped kitchenette. There is also a spacious private terrace. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite/cable TV, chargeable internet, air-conditioning and a safe. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. The restaurant serves a delicious selection of local and international dishes. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible onsite.
